about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Passionate about technology and sharing knowledge

story.title: My Story
story.paragraph1: I'm a rookie developer still exploring career possibilities, and I think creating from 0 to 1 is a lot of fun and fulfilling. Unfortunately, I have many ideas and too little time.
story.paragraph2: I love to practice new technologies and apply them to real projects. This blog is where I step through the potholes and realise some of my personal ideas. I hope you can find something useful here.
story.paragraph3: I usually work on Linux FYI if you want to download projects to play. I sometimes playing with Unity and Blender for interest.

master.title: Master of Computer Science
master.shortDescription: Study state-of-the-art in software development and distributed systems. I TA for the HCAI System Design course.
master.description: Currently pursuing a Master's degree in Computer Science at Delft University of Technology.
master.focus1: Learning cutting-edge technologies (AIGC, LLM, Automation, etc.)
master.focus2: Studying software architecture, design, and code analysis
master.focus3: Exploring AI applications in software development

bachelor.title: Bachelor of Computer Science
bachelor.shortDescription: Completed bachelor of Computer Science at Delft University of Technology.
bachelor.description: Pursued advanced studies in web development to enhance my skills.
bachelor.achievement1: Learned Java and relevant backend development stack (Spring, MyBatis, MySQL, Redis, Kafka, etc.)
bachelor.achievement2: Studied machine learning, neural networks, and data mining, and other fundamentals of modern computer science
bachelor.achievement3: Researched software architecture patterns, design patterns, databases, algorithms and data structures, computer networking, etc.

start.title: Caxton College Valencia
start.shortDescription: Completed A-Level with A* in Maths, A in Further Maths, and A in Physics.
start.description: My interest in programming began with low-code platforms in middle school and programming robotics with GUI.
start.milestone1: Completed online courses in web development
